content.raw:
This may be more personal preference, but I’m not a fan of using a type alias here.  I prefer the added verbosity of including the full type name in the code.  I do see the other side that it simplifies the code, but to me the added reference in the header file has the potential to add confusion.

@{557058:4ded1ddf-947e-4154-bbd1-3dba24f1bdbd} might have better guidance on any Gazebo conventions here.
content.html:
This may be more personal preference, but I’m not a fan of using a type alias here. I prefer the added verbosity of including the full type name in the code. I do see the other side that it simplifies the code, but to me the added reference in the header file has the potential to add confusion.

@Carlos Agüero might have better guidance on any Gazebo conventions here.
